        Generates random obstacles.
        Parameters:
        numObstacles - The number of obstacles to generate
        width - The grid width
        height - The grid height
        initialPoint - The initial point
        finalPoint - The final point
        random - The random number generator
        Returns:
        A list of randomly generated obstacle points
